PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – preparation of fields – establishing, planting and treatment of crops – spraying including from the air – trimming of fruit trees and vines – transplanting of rice and thinning of beets – cotton ginning services – harvesting and preparation for primary markets – other services necessary for agricultural production

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – pest control – operation of irrigation systems – renting of agricultural machinery with crew and operators

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – services provided by agronomists and agricultural economists, classified in 74.14.15

Label.LabelText: Planting and maintenance services of gardens, parks and cemeteries

PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – planting and maintenance services of sports fields, ornamental or pleasure gardens, cemeteries and other green areas – tree pruning and hedge trimming services, for ornamental trees

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – construction work, classified in 45 – landscape architectural services, classified in 74.20.52 – cemeteries and cremation services, classified in 93.03.11

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions

PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – general construction work of long-distance electricity power lines above ground for railways, classified in 45.21.33 – general construction work of long-distance electricity power lines above ground other than for railways, classified in 45.21.34

Label.LabelText: General construction work for local electricity power lines (including ancillary works), underground

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – general construction work of long-distance submarine or underground electricity power lines, classified in 45.21.35

Label.LabelText: General construction work for local telephone and other communication lines (including ancillary works), above ground

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – general construction work of long-distance communication lines above ground, classified in 45.21.36

Label.LabelText: General construction work for local telephone and other communication lines (including ancillary works), underground

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – general construction work of local communication lines underground including ancillary work

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – general construction work for underground lines for cable television

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – general construction work of long-distance submarine or underground communication lines, classified in 45.21.37

Label.LabelText: General construction work for power plants, mining and manufacturing
General construction work for power plants

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – general construction work for all kind of power plants

Label.LabelText: General construction work for mining and manufacturing

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – general construction work for mining and manufacturing, e.g. loading and discharging stations, winding-shafts, chemical plants, iron foundries, blast furnaces and coke ovens

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – general construction work of warehouses and industrial buildings, classified in 45.21.13

Label.LabelText: General construction work of other structures and for engineering works n.e.c.
General construction work of structures for stadia and sport grounds

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – general construction work of structures for stadia and other grounds for sports generally played in the open air such as football, baseball, rugby, track and field sports, motor racing and horse racing

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – flatwork for stadia and sports grounds, classified in 45.23.21

Label.LabelText: General construction work of structures for swimming pools

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – installation work of domestic swimming pools, classified in 45.45.13

Label.LabelText: General construction work of structures for other sport and recreation installations

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – general construction work of installations for indoor sports or recreation (ice rinks, gymnasia, indoor tennis courts, general-purpose sports halls, boat sheds, etc.)

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – general construction work of structures for swimming pools, classified in 45.21.62 – flatwork for sports and recreation installations other than stadia and sports grounds, classified in 45.23.22

Label.LabelText: General construction work for engineering works n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – general construction work for water treatment and purification plants

Label.LabelText: Assembly and erection of prefabricated constructions
Assembly and erection of prefabricated residential buildings

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – installation work on site of complete prefabricated residential buildings, or assembly and erection of prefabricated residential buildings

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – erection work of prefabricated steel parts for residential buildings, classified in 45.25.41

Label.LabelText: Assembly and erection of prefabricated non-residential buildings

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – erection work of prefabricated steel parts for non-residential buildings, classified in 45.25.41

Label.LabelText: Assembly and erection of other prefabricated structures

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – installation work of street furniture such as telephone booths, public toilets, bus shelters, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – erection work of prefabricated steel parts for other structures, classified in 45.25.42

Label.LabelText: Erection work of roof covering and frames
Roofing work
Roof framing work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – construction work involving the installation of any kind of roof frames

Label.LabelText: Roof covering work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – construction work involving the installation of any kind of roof coverings

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – roof painting work, classified in 45.44.22

Label.LabelText: Flashing and guttering work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – installation work of guttering and spouting, roof shingling and metal roof work

Label.LabelText: Waterproofing work
Waterproofing work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – waterproofing work on flat roofs and roof terraces – waterproofing work on the outside of constructions and other subterranean structures

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – insulation work, classified in 45.32.1

Label.LabelText: General construction work for motorways, roads, airfields and sport facilities

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This class does not include: – preliminary earth moving, classified in 45.11

Label.LabelText: General construction work for motorways, roads, railways and airfield runways
General foundation work for motorways, roads, streets and other vehicular or pedestrian ways

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – general construction work of foundations for highways (except elevated highways), roads, streets, other vehicular and pedestrian ways and open car parks

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – general construction work for elevated highways, bridges and tunnels, classified in 45.21.2 – installation services of crash barriers and low separating walls, classified in 45.23.12 – general construction or restoration of the road surface, classified in 45.23.12

Label.LabelText: General surface work for motorways, roads, streets and other vehicular or pedestrian ways

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – general construction or restoration work of the road surface with asphalt, concrete, etc. – general construction work of footpaths, traffic-calming structures, cycle tracks, etc. – installation work of crash barriers, low separating walls, prefabricated noise barriers, traffic signs, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – creation, maintenance and signposting of tracks and paths – work involving surfacing of parking lots

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – roadworks relating to pipelines and cables (water, drainage, gas, electricity, telephone, etc.), classified in 45.21.4 – marking of road surfaces and parking lots, classified in 45.23.15

Label.LabelText: General construction work for railways

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – laying work of ballast and rails – installation work of switch gear, points and crossings – construction work for control and safety systems for railway tracks – renovation or repair services of railway track – general construction work for funicular railways and cable car systems

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – general construction work for civil engineering works (bridges, tunnels), classified in 45.21.2 – general construction work for electricity power lines for railways, classified in 45.21.33

Label.LabelText: General construction work for airfield runways

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – general construction work for taxiways and aprons for aircraft

Label.LabelText: Painting work of markings on roads surfaces, parking lots and similar surfaces
Flatwork for sport and recreation installations
Flatwork for stadia and sport grounds

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – construction work other than buildings (= flatwork) for stadia and other grounds for sports generally played in the open air such as football, baseball, rugby, track and field sports, motor racing and horse racing

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – general construction work of structures and installations for stadia and sports grounds, classified in 45.21.61 – preliminary earthmoving works, classified in 45.11

Label.LabelText: Flatwork for other sport and recreation installations

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – work involved in the construction of flatwork for indoor sport or recreation (ice rinks, gymnasia, indoor tennis and the like)

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – general construction work of structures for sport and recreation installations other than stadia and sports grounds, classified in 45.21.63

Label.LabelText: General construction work for water projects
General construction work for waterways, harbours, dams and other waterworks
General coastal and port construction work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – general construction work of harbours, marinas, quays, piers, jetties, docks and similar harbour installations

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – general construction work of locks, floodgates and other hydro-mechanical structures, classified in 45.24.13

Label.LabelText: General construction work of dams, canals, irrigation channels and aqueducts

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – general construction work for pipelines and for water and sewer mains, classified in 45.21.32 (long-distance) and 45.21.41 (local), respectively – general construction work of locks, floodgates and other hydro-mechanical structures, classified in 45.24.13

Label.LabelText: General construction work of locks, floodgates and other hydro-mechanical structures

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – general construction work of locks, floodgates, sluices, lifts, dry docks, slipways, barrages and similar hydro-mechanical structures

Label.LabelText: Dredging work; other water-associated work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – dredging work, rock and silt removal and other water-associated general construction work

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – underwater work (by divers, frogmen or other techniques) and various hydraulic engineering work

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – laying of submarine cables, classified in 45.21.3

Label.LabelText: Other construction work involving special trades
Scaffolding work
Scaffolding work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – scaffold and work-platform erecting and dismantling work, with or without renting of scaffolding and work platforms

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – renting services of scaffolding without erection and dismantling, classified in 71.32.10

Label.LabelText: Foundation work; water well drilling
Foundation work, including pile driving

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – special trade foundation work and pile driving and related work

Label.LabelText: Water well drilling

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – special trade construction work involving drilling or digging water wells – shaft sinking

Label.LabelText: Concrete work
Reinforced concrete work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – erection of reinforced concrete framework requiring specialised skills or equipment because of its size or the method used – construction of domes and thin shells in concrete – special trade construction work involving steel bending and welding for reinforced concreting on construction projects

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – general construction work for bridges, elevated highways, tunnels and subways, classified in 45.21.2

Label.LabelText: Other concrete work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – casting of concrete in formwork and other work generally making use of concrete (general foundations, base courses, raft foundations, stanchions, floors, etc.)

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – work involving the construction of formwork – consolidation of foundations

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – concrete components for construction, classified in 26.61.12 – ready-mixed concrete, classified in 26.63.10 – construction work involving the paving of streets, highways and public sidewalks, classified in 45.23.1

Label.LabelText: Structural steel components erection work
Structural steel components erection work for buildings

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – special trade construction work on steel frameworks – erection work from prefabricated (but not self-manufactured) structural steel components for buildings – erection of curtain walls – associated welding work

Label.LabelText: Structural steel components erection work for other structures

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – special trade construction work on steel frameworks – erection work from prefabricated (but not self-manufactured) structural steel components for other structures such as bridges, overhead cranes or electricity transmission towers – associated welding work

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – leasing of scaffolding or lifting equipment without operator, classified in 71.32.10

Label.LabelText: Masonry and bricklaying work
Masonry and bricklaying work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – bricklaying – block laying – stone setting and other masonry work

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – concrete work, classified in 45.25.3

Label.LabelText: Other special trade construction work
Erection work of industrial chimneys

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – general construction work of factory chimneys – general construction work of refractory linings for furnaces, etc.

Label.LabelText: Other special trade construction work n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – general construction work or erection of ornamental fire places – other special trade construction work not elsewhere classified, e.g. moving of buildings, asbestos removal work, de-humidification of buildings – lifting work – work with specialist access requirements necessitating climbing skills and the use of related equipment i.e. working at height on tall structures

Label.LabelText: Building installation work
Installation work of electrical wiring and fittings
Electrical wiring and fitting work
Electrical wiring and fitting work in residential buildings

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – special trade construction work involving the installation of basic electrical wiring circuits or fittings in residential buildings

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – installation work for fire alarm systems, classified in 45.31.21 – installation work for burglar alarm systems, classified in 45.31.22

Label.LabelText: Electrical wiring and fitting work in non-residential buildings

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – special trade construction work involving the installation of basic electrical wiring circuits or fittings in non-residential buildings

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – electrical wiring and fitting work for emergency power supply systems

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – installation work for electric motors, generators and transformers in power stations, classified in 31.10.91 – installation work for test equipment, classified in 33.20.91

Fire and burglar alarm system and residential antenna installation work
Fire alarm system installation work

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – fireproofing work, classified in 45.32.12 – sprinkler installation work, classified in 45.33.20

Label.LabelText: Burglar alarm system installation work
Residential antenna installation work

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – installation work of lightning conductors

Label.LabelText: Lift and escalator installation work
Lift and escalator installation work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – installation work of lifts, escalators and travelators

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – maintenance and repair services of lifts and escalators, classified in 29.22.92

Label.LabelText: Other electrical building installation work
Electrical installation work of telecommunications wiring
Electrical installation work of heating and other electrical equipment, including electric solar energy collectors, of buildings
Insulation work
Insulation work
Thermal insulation work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – thermal insulation work involving weather-proofing insulating materials for exterior wall cavities – thermal insulation work to hot and chilled water pipes, boilers and duct runs

Label.LabelText: Other insulation work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – insulation work including sound insulation and fireproofing work

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – waterproofing work, classified in 45.22.20

Label.LabelText: Plumbing work
Heating, ventilation and air conditioning installation work
Central heating installation work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – construction work involving non-electric heating equipment, including non-electric solar energy collectors. Pipework, ductwork and related sheet metal work performed as an integral part of such work is included – installation and maintenance of central heating control systems – connection to the district heating system – maintenance and repair services of domestic boilers and burners

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – installation, maintenance and repair services of boilers for hot-water industrial capacity central heating such as for large residential blocks and for district heating, classified in 28.22.9 – chimney cleaning, classified in 74.70.15

Label.LabelText: Ventilation and air conditioning installation work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – construction work involving ventilation, refrigeration or air conditioning equipment for dwellings, computer centres, offices and shops. Pipework, ductwork and related sheet metal work performed as an integral part of such work is included – installation, maintenance and repair of domestic ventilation, refrigeration or air conditioning equipment

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – installation, maintenance and repair services of industrial air conditioning and refrigeration equipment, classified in 29.23.91

Label.LabelText: Water plumbing and drain laying work
Water plumbing and drain laying work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – construction work involving primary hot and cold water piping systems – installation work for disposal of sewage, including drains and septic tanks – installation work for sanitary ware – sprinkler installation work – installation work for dry standing pipes, i.e. pressurised water supplies for fire fighting (including fire plugs with hose and spout)

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – construction of sewage pipelines, classified in 45.21.41 – installation work of space heating apparatus, including associated pipework, classified in 45.33.11

Label.LabelText: Gas fitting installation work
Gas fitting installation work

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – installation work for the supply of various gases (e.g. oxygen in hospitals) and connection of other gas-operated equipment

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – space heating installation work, classified in 45.33.11, whether or not for use with gas – ventilating and air conditioning work, classified in 45.33.12

Label.LabelText: Other building installation work
Fencing and railing installation work
Fencing and railing installation work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – construction work of fences, railings and similar enclosures. The fences may be of different materials (wire, wood, steel, fibreglass) and may be used at various sites (courts, playgrounds, residential properties or industrial premises)

Label.LabelText: Other electrical installation work
Installation work of illumination and signalling systems for roads, airports and harbours

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – electrical installation work of illumination and signalling systems for roads, railways, airports, harbours and similar premises

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – construction work for control and safety systems for railway tracks, classified in 45.23.13

Label.LabelText: Other electrical installation work n.e.c.
Other installation work
Installation work of blinds and awnings
Other installation work n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – installation work, not elsewhere classified, involving goods not regarded as part of the basic building structure – installation work of signs (luminous or not), other than traffic signs – general technical maintenance and repair services of building installations

Label.LabelText: Building completion work
Plastering work
Plastering work
Plastering work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – construction work of interior and exterior plaster or stucco and of lathing materials – dry walling work involving the installation of wallboard generally of gypsum

Label.LabelText: Joinery installation work
Joinery installation work
Installation of door and window frames

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – installation work of door and window frames and of doors, windows, shutters, slatted shutters, garage doors, etc., made of any kind of material – armouring of outside doors and installation work of armoured doors – installation work of fire doors

Label.LabelText: Other metal joinery installation work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – installation work of movable partitions and false ceilings on metallic structures – installation work of verandas and conservatories for private houses

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – installation work of metal fencing and railings, classified in 45.34.10 – installation work of metal door and window frames, classified in 45.42.11 – ornamental ironwork, classified in 45.45.11

Label.LabelText: Other non-metal joinery installation work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – construction work involving carpentry and joinery work with materials other than metals – installation work of interior staircases, construction of wall cupboards, installation work of fitted kitchen units – installation work of clapboard, panelling, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – installation work of other fencing and railings, classified in 45.34.10 – installation work of door and window frames, classified in 45.42.11

Label.LabelText: Floor and wall covering work
Floor and tiling work
Exterior floor and wall tiling work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – laying or setting work of ceramic, concrete or stone wall tiles, floor tiles and flagstones on the outside of buildings and other structures – decorative covering of exterior walls of buildings with ceramic materials, ceramic stove fitting, stone, brick, etc.

Label.LabelText: Interior floor and wall tiling work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – laying or setting work of ceramic, concrete or cut stone wall or floor tiles inside buildings and other structures

Label.LabelText: Other floor laying and covering, wall covering and wall papering work
Laying work of flexible floor coverings

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – laying of carpeting, linoleum and other flexible flooring

Label.LabelText: Other floor laying and covering work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – laying work of other floors and floor coverings, including parquet and other hardwood flooring and asphalt tiles. Related finishing work such as sanding, wax polishing, sealing, etc., is included

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – installation work of concrete floors (except concrete tiles), classified in 45.25.32 – installation work of stone, concrete and ceramic floor tiles, classified in 45.43.1

Label.LabelText: Wall covering and wall papering work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – hanging of paper and other flexible wall coverings

Label.LabelText: Interior fitting decoration work
Interior fitting decoration work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – construction work of poured-in-place terrazzo works and interior marble, granite or slate works

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – exterior decoration work, classified in 45.25.50 – installation work of tiles, classified in 45.43.12

Label.LabelText: Painting and glazing work
Glazing work
Glazing work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – construction work of glass, glass cladding, mirror walls and other glass products – closed-in work such as window glass installation work

Label.LabelText: Painting work
Painting work on building interiors

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – painting work (principally decorative) on building interiors and similar work (application of coatings, lacquer, etc.)

Label.LabelText: Painting work on building exteriors

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – painting work on building exteriors (principally for protection) – painting work on railings, gratings, doors and window frames of buildings, etc. – roof painting work

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – waterproofing work, classified in 45.22.20 – painting work of markings on roads surfaces, parking lots and similar surfaces, classified in 45.23.15

Label.LabelText: Painting work on other engineering structures

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – painting work of markings on road surfaces, parking lots and similar surfaces, classified in 45.23.15

Label.LabelText: Other building completion work
Other building completion work
Ornamentation fitting work

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – installation work of standard or custom-fabricated sheet metal – decorative iron or steel work and ornamental metal work – installation work of grilles covering radiators

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – installation work of sheet metal roofing, classified in 45.22.12

Label.LabelText: Exterior cleaning work of buildings

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – cleaning of outer walls by steam cleaning or sandblasting

Label.LabelText: Other building completion and finishing work n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – building completion and finishing work not elsewhere classified, e.g. acoustic work involving the application of acoustic panels, tiles and other materials to interior walls and ceilings – installation of private swimming pools

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – sound insulation work, classified in 45.32.12

Label.LabelText: Renting services of construction or demolition equipment with operator
Renting services of construction or demolition equipment with operator
Renting services of construction or demolition equipment with operator
Renting services of construction or demolition equipment with operator

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – renting services of cranes, with operator

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – leasing or rental services concerning construction and civil engineering machinery and equipment without operator, classified in 71.32.10

WHOLESALE AND RETAIL TRADE SERVICES; REPAIR SERVICES OF MOTOR VEHICLES, MOTORCYCLES AND PERSONAL AND HOUSEHOLD GOODS
TRADE, MAINTENANCE AND REPAIR SERVICES OF MOTOR VEHICLES AND MOTORCYCLES; RETAIL TRADE SERVICES OF AUTOMOTIVE FUEL
Trade services of motor vehicles
Trade services of motor vehicles
Wholesale trade services of motor vehicles

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This category includes: – wholesale trade services of both new and second-hand vehicles

Label.LabelText: Wholesale trade services of lorries, trucks, trailers, semi-trailers and buses

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – wholesale trade services of motor lorries and trucks, road tractors for semi-trailers, semi-trailers and trailers, passenger motor buses and coaches

Label.LabelText: Wholesale trade services of other passenger motor vehicles
Wholesale trade services of caravans and other camping vehicles

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – wholesale trade services of motorised caravans, camping trailers and other camping vehicles

Label.LabelText: Wholesale trade services of special purpose and of other motor vehicles
Retail trade services of motor vehicles
Retail trade services of new passenger motor vehicles

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – retail trade services of new passenger motor vehicles including specialised passenger motor vehicles, motor vehicles to negotiate rough terrain and other new passenger motor vehicles with motor-car type steering mechanisms

Label.LabelText: Retail trade services of used passenger motor vehicles

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – retail trade services of used passenger motor vehicles including specialised passenger motor vehicles, motor vehicles to negotiate unusual terrain and other used passenger motor vehicles with motor-car type steering mechanisms

Label.LabelText: Retail trade services of caravans and other camping vehicles

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – retail trade services of motorised caravans, camping trailers and other camping vehicles

Label.LabelText: Sales on a fee or contract basis of motor vehicles

Label.LabelText: Maintenance and repair services of passenger motor cars

PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – mechanical maintenance and repair services of passenger motor cars. Such services may involve engine overhaul, motor tune-up, carburettor repair and adjustment, electronic injection system repair, steering gear repair and adjustment, suspension repair, brake repair and adjustment, transmission repair and adjustment, exhaust system repair, cooling system repair – operations involving periodic inspections or service station types of inspection

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions

Label.LabelText: HOTEL AND RESTAURANT SERVICES
HOTEL AND RESTAURANT SERVICES
HOTEL AND RESTAURANT SERVICES
Hotel services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This group includes: – lodging and related services provided by hotels, motels, inns and similar lodging places. Related services comprise services normally provided with, and included in, the lodging price, such as breakfast, room service, desk service, mail service and bellboy service. Hotels also generally make available other services such as parking, food, beverages, entertainment, swimming pools and banquet, convention, meeting and conference facilities. Resort hotels may provide extensive recreational facilities. These various services are included here if provided as a part of the price of lodging. If they are priced separately, they are classified according to the service provided. The services rendered by hotels are generally more complete than those offered by motels, inns and other lodging places

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This group does not include: – food preparation and serving services, classified in 55.30.1 – beverage serving services, classified in 55.40.10 – renting or leasing services involving residential properties, classified in 70.20.11

Label.LabelText: Hotel services
Hotel services
Hotel services

Youth hostel and mountain refuge services
Youth hostel and mountain refuge services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – lodging and related services provided by youth hostels, mountain shelters and similar facilities. These services are distinguished from full hotel services by the more limited service provided

Camping site services, including caravan site services

Label.LabelText: Letting services of other short-stay furnished accommodation

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – lodging and related services provided by rooming houses, boarding houses, cabins, private apartments and homes, farmhouses and similar lodging facilities. Most of these units provide only lodging, although some may include food serving services

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – hotel lodging services, classified in 55.10.10 – letting services of long-stay furnished accommodation services, classified in 70.20.11

Other short-stay accommodation services n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – serving services of beverages without prepared food, classified in 55.40.10

Normally a full service consisting of waiter service to individual customers seated at tables (including counters or booths) is provided

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – serving services of beverages without prepared foods, classified in 55.40.10

Label.LabelText: Other food serving services

PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – other food preparation and related beverage supply services provided by refreshment stands, fish-and-chips stands, fast-food outlets without seating, and take-away facilities. These facilities normally do not offer seating

PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – urban and suburban regularly scheduled multi-stop passenger transportation via highways and other modes of land transport – motor-bus, tramway, trolley bus and similar services generally rendered on a franchise basis within the confines of a single city or group of contiguous cities

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – transport of accompanying luggage, animals and the like

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – urban and suburban passenger transportation by railway, classified in 60.21.10

Label.LabelText: Urban and suburban special transportation, other than by railway

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – special passenger road transport services often organised for a restricted clientele and operating on predetermined routes on predetermined schedules – school buses to carry pupils between their homes and schools, between schools, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – taxi services, classified in 60.22.11 and other non-scheduled chauffeur-driven hire car services, classified in 60.22.12

Label.LabelText: Interurban passenger transportation, other than by railway
Interurban regular transportation, other than by railway

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – interurban regularly scheduled highway passenger transportation by motor-bus

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – transport of accompanying luggage, animals and the like

Label.LabelText: Interurban special transportation, other than by railway

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – scheduled transportation between an urban centre and airports or stations in another urban centre by motor-bus and multi-passenger airport limousine, with driver

Label.LabelText: Passenger transportation by funiculars, teleferics, ski-lifts and other scheduled passenger land transportation
Passenger transportation services by funiculars, teleferics and ski-lifts
Other scheduled passenger land transportation services n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – other scheduled passenger land transportation by mechanised land vehicle, not elsewhere classified

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – transport of accompanying luggage, animals and the like

Label.LabelText: Taxi services and rental services of passenger cars with driver
Taxi services and rental services of passenger cars with driver
Taxi services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – motorised taxi-cab services, including urban, suburban and interurban. These services are generally rendered on a distance-travelled basis, for a limited duration of time and to a specific destination. Connected reservation services are also included

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – animal-drawn taxi services, classified in 60.23.13 – water and air taxi services, classified in 61.20.12 and 62.20.10, respectively – ambulance services, classified in 85.14.14

Label.LabelText: Rental services of passenger cars with driver

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – chauffeur-driven hire car services, wherever delivered, except taxi services. These services are generally supplied on a time basis to a limited number of passengers and frequently involve transportation to more than one destination

Label.LabelText: Other land passenger transportation services
Other land passenger transportation services
Rental services of buses and coaches with driver

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – chauffeur-driven hired bus and motor coach services, generally rendered on a time and distance basis, except sightseeing-bus services. They frequently involve transportation to more than one destination

Label.LabelText: Sightseeing-bus services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – sightseeing-bus services, including city tours. Incidental services not charged for separately (guides, provision of food, etc.) are included here

Label.LabelText: Passenger transportation by animal-drawn vehicles

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – passenger transportation animal-drawn vehicles or conveyances and by pack animals, provided that the services of a driver are provided with the vehicle or animals

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – animal-drawn passenger vehicle rental services without the services of a driver, classified in 71.21.15

Label.LabelText: Other non-scheduled passenger land transportation services n.e.c.
Freight transportation services by road
Freight transportation services by specialized road vehicles
Transportation by vehicles for frozen or refrigerated goods

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – transportation by road of frozen or refrigerated goods in specially refrigerated trucks and cars

Label.LabelText: Transportation by vehicles for petroleum products

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – transportation by road of petroleum products (crude oil, natural gas and refined petroleum products) in special tank trucks

Label.LabelText: Transportation by vehicles for other bulk liquids or gases

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – transportation by road of other bulk liquids or gases in special tank trucks, including milk collection at farms

Label.LabelText: Transportation by vehicles for containerized freight

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – transportation by road of individual articles and packages assembled and shipped in specially constructed shipping containers designed for ease of handling in transport

Label.LabelText: Transportation by vehicles for furniture removals

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – transportation of furniture by road over any distance

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – furniture removal services

Label.LabelText: Transportation by vehicles for dry bulk goods

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – transportation by road of dry bulk goods such as cereals, flours, cement, sand, coal, etc.

Label.LabelText: Transportation services by specialized vehicles, n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – transportation by road by other specialised vehicles n.e.c. Included here are transport of concrete and tarred macadam, farm animals, cars, etc. by specialised vehicles

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – armoured car services, classified in 74.60.14

Label.LabelText: Freight transportation services by non-specialized road vehicles
Transportation of mail by road
Transportation of other freight by road

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – transportation by road of freight not elsewhere classified by non-specialised vehicles

Label.LabelText: Rental services of commercial freight vehicles with driver
Rental services of commercial freight vehicles with driver

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – rental of trucks without driver, classified in 71.21.11

Label.LabelText: Transportation services via pipelines
Transportation services via pipelines
Transportation services via pipelines
Transportation of crude or refined petroleum and petroleum products via pipelines
Transportation of natural gas via pipelines

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – liquefaction and regasification services of natural gas, classified in 11.10.30 – distribution services of natural gas to end-users, classified in 40.22.11

Label.LabelText: Transportation of other goods via pipelines

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – transportation via pipeline of other chemical products, coal slurry and other products not elsewhere classified

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – distribution services of natural gas, steam and water to end-users, classified in 40.22.11, 40.30.10 and 41.00.20, respectively

Label.LabelText: WATER TRANSPORT SERVICES
Sea and coastal water transportation services
Sea and coastal water transportation services
Sea and coastal water passenger transportation services
Sea and coastal water passenger transportation by ferries

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – passenger transportation by ferries, including hydrofoils and hovercraft, on a scheduled or non-scheduled basis

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – transport of accompanying luggage, animals and the like

Label.LabelText: Other sea and coastal water passenger transportation

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – passenger transportation by seagoing vessels, on a scheduled or non-scheduled basis – sea cruises (transportation, accommodation, provision of food and incidental services not separately charged for) – transportation of passengers from port to port

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – transport of accompanying luggage, animals and the like – renting services of pleasure boats with a crew

Label.LabelText: Sea and coastal water freight transportation services
Sea and coastal water transportation of frozen or refrigerated goods

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – transportation by seagoing vessels of frozen or refrigerated goods in specially refrigerated compartments

Label.LabelText: Sea and coastal water transportation of crude oil
Sea and coastal water transportation of other bulk liquids or gases

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – transportation by seagoing vessels of other bulk liquids or gases such as natural gas, methane and refined petroleum products in special tankers

Label.LabelText: Sea and coastal water transportation of containerized freight

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – transportation by seagoing vessels of individual articles and packages assembled and shipped in specially constructed shipping containers designed for ease of handling in transport

Label.LabelText: Sea and coastal water transportation of mail
Sea and coastal water transportation of dry bulk goods

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – transportation by seagoing vessels of dry bulk goods such as cereals, flours, cement, sand, coal, etc.

Label.LabelText: Sea and coastal water transportation of other freight
Rental services of sea-going vessels with crew; towing and pushing services
Rental services of sea-going vessels with crew

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – rental services of all types of self-propelled, seagoing vessels with crew, such as passenger vessels, tankers, bulk dry cargo vessels, cargo and freight vessels, tugboats and fishing vessels

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – leasing or rental services of vessels without crew, classified in 71.22.10

Label.LabelText: Sea and coastal water towing and pushing services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – towing and pushing services on high seas and coastal waters – towing services of oil rigs, floating cranes, dredging vessels, buoys and for hulls and incomplete vessels – towing services of distressed seagoing vessels

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – tugboat-assisted docking and undocking services, classified in 63.22.13 – vessel salvage and refloating services, classified in 63.22.15

Label.LabelText: Inland water transportation services
Inland water transportation services
Passenger transportation services by vessels on inland waterways
Passenger transportation by ferries on inland waterways

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – passenger transportation on rivers, canals and other inland waters by non-seagoing ferries, including hydrofoils and hovercraft, whether on a scheduled or non-scheduled basis

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – transportation services of accompanying vehicles, luggage, animals and the like

Label.LabelText: Other passenger transportation on inland waterways

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – passenger transportation on rivers, canals and other inland waterways by vessels of any kind other than ferries

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – water taxi, excursion and sightseeing boat services – renting services of pleasure boats with a crew

Label.LabelText: Freight transportation services by vessels on inland waterways
Transportation of frozen or refrigerated goods on inland waterways

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – transportation by non-seagoing vessels of frozen or refrigerated goods in specially refrigerated compartments

Label.LabelText: Transportation of crude oil on inland waterways

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – transportation by non-seagoing vessels of crude oil in special tankers

Label.LabelText: Transportation of other bulk liquids or gases on inland waterways

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – transportation by non-seagoing vessels of other bulk liquids or gases such as natural gas, methane and refined petroleum products in special tankers

Label.LabelText: Transportation of containerized freight on inland waterways

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – transportation by non-seagoing vessels of individual articles and packages assembled and shipped in specially constructed containers designed for ease of handling in transport

Label.LabelText: Transportation of other freight on inland waterways
Rental services of non-sea-going vessels with crew; towing and pushing services
Rental services of non-sea-going vessels with crew

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – rental services of all types of self-propelled, non-seagoing vessels with crew, such as passenger vessels, tankers, bulk dry cargo vessels, cargo and freight vessels, tugboats and fishing vessels

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – leasing or rental services of vessels without crew, classified in 71.22.10 – leasing or rental services of non-seagoing pleasure boats, classified in 71.40.14

Label.LabelText: Towing and pushing services on inland waterways

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – barge towing services on inland waterways and canals – towing services of oil rigs, floating cranes, dredging vessels, buoys, hulls and incomplete vessels – towing services of distressed non-seagoing vessels

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – tugboat-assisted docking and undocking services, classified in 63.22.13

Label.LabelText: AIR TRANSPORT SERVICES
Scheduled air transportation services
Scheduled air transportation services
Scheduled passenger transportation services by air
Scheduled passenger transportation services by air

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – passenger air transportation on regular routes and on regular schedules. These services are supplied by aircraft (including helicopters) of any type

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – transportation services of passenger baggage

Label.LabelText: Scheduled freight transportation services by air
Scheduled transportation services of mail by air
Scheduled transportation services of containerized freight by air
Scheduled transportation services of other freight by air
Non-scheduled air transportation services
Non-scheduled air transportation services
Non-scheduled passenger transportation services by air
Non-scheduled passenger transportation services by air

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – passenger air transportation on a non-scheduled basis, supplied by aircraft (including helicopters) of any type – sightseeing services and air taxi services, including by helicopters

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – transportation services of passenger baggage

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – rental services of aircraft with crew, classified in 62.20.30

Label.LabelText: Non-scheduled freight transportation services by air
Non-scheduled freight transportation services by air

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – non-scheduled transportation of mail, containerised freight and other freight, by air

Label.LabelText: Rental services of aircraft with crew
Rental services of aircraft with crew

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – rental services of freight or passenger-carrying aircraft (including helicopters) of any type and for any purpose, with crew. These services are generally supplied on a time basis and several different destinations are frequently involved

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – leasing or rental services of aircraft without crew, classified in 71.23.10

Label.LabelText: Space transportation services
Space transportation services
Space transportation services
Space transportation services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – launching and placing of satellites in space

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – services provided by space laboratories

Label.LabelText: SUPPORTING AND AUXILIARY TRANSPORT SERVICES; TRAVEL AGENCY SERVICES
Cargo handling and storage services
Cargo handling services
Cargo handling services
Container handling services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – cargo handling services provided for freight in special containers – services of freight terminal facilities for all modes of transport, including stevedoring services (i.e. loading, unloading and discharging of vessels’ containerised freight, at ports)

Label.LabelText: Other cargo handling services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – cargo handling services provided for non-containerised freight or for passenger baggage – services of freight terminal facilities, for all modes of transport, including stevedoring services (i.e. loading, unloading and discharging of vessels’ non-containerised freight, at ports)

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – baggage handling services at airports and at bus, rail or highway vehicle terminals

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – other supporting and auxiliary transport services linked to a specific mode of transport, classified in 63.21.10 for railway transport, 63.21.25 for road transport, 63.22.16 for water transport and 63.23.13 for air transport

Label.LabelText: Storage and warehousing services
Storage and warehousing services
Storage services of frozen or refrigerated goods

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – storage and warehousing services of frozen or refrigerated goods, including perishable food products

Label.LabelText: Storage services of liquids or gases

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – bulk storage and warehousing services of liquids and gases, including oil and oil products, wine and the like

Label.LabelText: Storage services of grains
Other storage or warehousing services
Other transport supporting services
Other supporting services for land transport
Supporting services for railway transport
Supporting services for railway transport

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – railway passenger terminal services (sale of tickets, reservations, luggage office, left-luggage office) – operation services of railroad infrastructure – maintenance and minor repair services of rolling stock – other supporting services for railway transport, not elsewhere classified

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – shunting services, classified in 60.10.30 – railway freight cargo handling services, classified in 63.11.11, if for containerised freight, and in 63.11.12, if for non-containerised freight or passenger baggage

Label.LabelText: Other supporting services for road transport
Bus station services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – passenger terminal services in connection with bus transport (sale of tickets, reservations, luggage office, left-luggage office)

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – baggage and freight handling services, classified in 63.11.12

Label.LabelText: Highway operation services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – operation services of motorways, roads and causeways

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – services of vehicle parking facilities, classified in 63.21.24

Label.LabelText: Bridges and tunnel operation services

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – services of vehicle parking facilities, classified in 63.21.24

Label.LabelText: Parking services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – parking services provided by car-parks, parking lots and parking garages, whether or not roofed – parking services for motor vehicles, motorcycles and bicycles

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – fee parking on streets, roads and public places

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – rental services of lock-up garages or garage premises for vehicles by the month or year, classified in 70.20.12

Label.LabelText: Other supporting services for road transport n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – cleaning services of buses and other transport vehicles, classified in 74.70.16

Label.LabelText: Other supporting services for water transport
Other supporting services for water transport
Port and waterway operation services, excluding cargo handling

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – port operation services such as wharves, docks, piers, quays and other services connected with port terminal facilities, including passenger terminal services in connection with water transportation – operation and maintenance services of boat, barge and ship canals, canalised rivers and other artificial inland waterways

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – services of locks, boat lifts, weirs, sluices – towing services on canals other than by tugboat, e.g. by tractors or locomotives on the tow-path

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – stevedoring services: • for containerised freight, classified in 63.11.11 • for non-containerised freight, classified in 63.11.12 – port storage and warehousing services, classified in 63.12.1 – pilotage services in connection with docking and undocking of vessels, classified in 63.22.12 – tugboat-assisted docking and undocking services, classified in 63.22.13

Label.LabelText: Pilotage services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – pilotage services, including services of pilot vessels, whether supplied to conduct a vessel in or out of harbours or around navigational dangers

Label.LabelText: Berthing services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – tugboat services in connection with the docking and undocking of vessels of all types

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – towing and pushing services: • on open sea, classified in 61.10.32 • on inland waterways, classified in 61.20.32

Label.LabelText: Navigation aid services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – services provided by lighthouses, lightships and light vessels, buoys, channel markers and similar aids to navigation

Label.LabelText: Vessel salvage and refloating services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – vessel salvage services, whether provided on ocean and coastal waters or on inland waterways. Such services consist of recovering distressed and sunken vessels and their cargoes, including raising of sunken vessels, righting of capsized vessels and refloating of stranded vessels

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – towing services supplied to distressed vessels: • for seagoing vessels, classified in 61.10.32 • for non-seagoing vessels, classified in 61.20.32

Label.LabelText: Other supporting services for water transport n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – water transport supporting services directly connected with vessel operations not elsewhere classified, and not directly connected with vessel operations such as ice breaking, vessel registration, vessel laying-up and storage services, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – disinfecting and exterminating services of vessels, classified in 74.70.11 – cleaning services of vessels, including removal of contamination by fuel and oil, classified in 74.70.16 – oil spill fighting services, classified in 90.03.12

Label.LabelText: Other supporting services for air transport
Other supporting services for air transport
Airport operation services, excluding cargo handling

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – passenger air terminal services and ground services on air fields, including runway operating services

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – air terminal cargo-handling services: • for containerised freight, classified in 63.11.11 • for non-containerised freight or for passenger baggage, classified in 63.11.12

Label.LabelText: Air traffic control services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – flight control tower operation services, including approach, landing and take-off control services

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – services provided by airport located radar stations

Label.LabelText: Other supporting services for air transport n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – aircraft fire-fighting and fire-prevention services – hangar services

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – aircraft towing – type rating services

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – disinfecting and exterminating services of aircraft, classified in 74.70.11 – cleaning services of aircraft, classified in 74.70.16 – air-sea rescue services, classified in 75.24.12 – general flying school services, classified in 80.41.12

Label.LabelText: Travel agency and tour operator services; tourist assistance services n.e.c.
Travel agency and tour operator services; tourist assistance services n.e.c.
Travel agency and tour operator services; tourist assistance services n.e.c.
Organization of package tour services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – services of organising and arranging package tours (all-inclusive tours). Such a package usually includes passenger and baggage transportation, accommodation, sightseeing arrangements and similar services provided during a package tour

Label.LabelText: Sales of travel tickets, lodging and package tours on a fee or contract basis
Tourist information services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – travel information, advice and planning services – accommodation reservation services

Label.LabelText: Tourist guide services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – tourist guide services by tourist guide agencies and own-account tourist guides

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – services of interpreters, classified in 74.85.14 – services of hunting and mountain guides, classified in 92.62.13

Label.LabelText: Other transport agency services
Other transport agency services
Freight transport agency services
Ship-broker services
Other forwarding agents services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – freight brokerage services – freight forwarding services (primarily transport organisation or arrangement services on behalf of the shipper or consignee) – aircraft space brokerage services – freight consolidation and break-bulk services

Label.LabelText: Other supporting and auxiliary transport services
Other supporting and auxiliary transport services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – bill auditing and freight rate information services – transportation document preparation services – packing and crating and unpacking and de-crating services – freight inspection, weighing and sampling services – freight receiving and acceptance services (including local pick-up and delivery)

Label.LabelText: POST AND TELECOMMUNICATION SERVICES
Post and courier services
National post services
Postal services

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This category does not include: – services provided by private courier services, classified in 64.12 – financial intermediation services provided by post office saving banks and postal giro, classified in 65.12.10

Label.LabelText: Postal services related to newspapers and periodicals

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – collection, transport and delivery services of newspapers, journals and periodicals, whether for domestic or foreign destinations, as rendered by the national postal administration

Label.LabelText: Postal services related to letters

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – collection services of letters, brochures, leaflets and similar printed matter, as rendered by the national postal administration: • collection on post office premises • collection in mail boxes • collection at the customers place – forwarding services of letters, brochures, leaflets and similar printed matter, as rendered by the national postal administration – delivery services of letters, brochures, leaflets and similar printed matter as rendered by the national postal administration: • by delivery services • by pick-up service • from post-box • as poste restante – additional services in connection with the handling of mail (express, registered, insured, return)

Label.LabelText: Postal services related to parcels

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – collection services of parcels and packages, as rendered by the national postal administration: • collection on post office premises • collection at the customers place – forwarding services of parcels and packages rendered by the national postal administration – delivery services of parcels and packages as rendered by the national postal administration: • by delivery services • by pick-up service – additional services in connection with the handling of mail (express, registered, insured, return)

Label.LabelText: Post office counter services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – services rendered at post office counters, e.g. sales of postage stamps or philatelic products, handling of certified or registered letters and packets, and other post office counter services

Label.LabelText: Other postal services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – poste restante services

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – services related to postal giro and postal savings’ accounts, classified in 65.12.10

Label.LabelText: Courier services other than national post services
Courier services other than national post services
Multi-modal courier services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – collection, transport and delivery services, whether for domestic or foreign destinations, of letters, parcels and packages, as rendered by courier and using one or more modes of transport, other than those provided by the national postal administration. These services can be provided using either self-owned or public transport media

Label.LabelText: Other courier services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – home delivery services – door-to-door delivery services using city messengers and goods taxis

Label.LabelText: Telecommunications services
Telecommunications services
Data and message transmitting services
Public local telephone services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText:
This subcategory includes: – switching and transmission services necessary to establish and maintain communications between local calling areas
This service is primarily designed (used) to establish voice communications, but may serve other applications such as text communication (facsimile or teletex) and may be provided on a toll or flat-rate basis.
This service provides the customer with access to the supplier’s and connecting carrier’s entire telephone network or, in some instances, to a limited number of exchange areas (WATS services).

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – private line services, classified in 64.20.14 and 64.20.15 – terminal equipment rental services, classified in 71.34.10

Label.LabelText: Public long distance telephone services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – telephone services for transmission of messages from the local area to the international network

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
