PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – information dissemination services, public relations services, fund-raising services and similar services, provided by political parties and similar organisations associated with a political party or candidates. These organisations are chiefly engaged in placing members of the party or those sympathetic to the party in political office

Label.LabelText: Services furnished by other membership organizations n.e.c.
Services furnished by other membership organizations n.e.c.
Civic betterment and community facility support services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – services provided by civic betterment associations and similar organisations, which are chiefly composed of individuals who have joined together for the purpose of furthering a public cause or issue by means of public education, political influence, etc. – services provided by associations for the support of community, social and educational facilities – services provided by environmental and ecological organisations and movements

Label.LabelText: Special group protection services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – services provided by associations for the protection and betterment of special groups, such as ethnic and minority groups by means of public education, political influence, etc.

Label.LabelText: Services provided by youth associations

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – services provided by associations of young people and children. Services of boys’, girls’ and similar associations and of student associations, clubs and fraternities, etc.

Label.LabelText: Other services provided by membership organizations n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – services provided by fraternal societies and similar organisations: • patriotic association services • cultural and non-sporting recreational club services • social community services • related services not elsewhere classified – services rendered by multi-functional clubs and community centres

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – services of associations for practising or promoting artistic activities, classified in 92.31.21 – services of sporting clubs, classified in 92.62.1

Label.LabelText: RECREATIONAL, CULTURAL AND SPORTING SERVICES
Motion picture and video services
Motion picture and video production services
Cinematographic film, exposed and developed
Cinematographic film, exposed and developed, of a width ≥ 35 mm
Cinematographic film, exposed and developed, of a width < 35 mm
Magnetic tapes with sound and vision recordings
Magnetic tapes with sound and vision recordings
Motion picture, video tape and DVD production and related services
Motion picture and, video tape and DVD production services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – production services of theatrical and non-theatrical motion pictures, whether on film, on video tape or on DVD, for direct projection in theatres, for broadcasting on television or for sale or rental to others – production services, in a motion picture studio or in special laboratories, of animated films or cartoons, short or full-length films, documentaries, etc., for public entertainment, promotion, education or training

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – production services of still and slide films, classified in 74.81.2 and 74.81.3 respectively

Label.LabelText: Other services in connection with motion picture, video tape DVD production, n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – auxiliary services, not elsewhere classified, to motion picture and tape production, such as film processing, film dubbing, film title printing, editing, cutting, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – services rendered by sound recording studios

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – film and video tape duplication services, classified in 22.32.10 – rental services of articles and equipment (e.g. scenery, cameras) to the entertainment industries, classified in 71.34.10 – agency services on behalf of individual performers, classified in 74.87.17 – casting and booking agency services, classified in 92.72.12

Label.LabelText: Motion picture or video tape distribution services
Motion picture, video tape or DVD distribution services
Motion picture, video tape or DVD distribution services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – distribution services of motion pictures, video tapes and DVDs to other industries, but not to the general public. This involves the sale or rental of movies, video tapes and DVDs to other industries, as well as services allied to the distribution of films and video tapes and DVDs, such as film and tape booking, delivery, storage, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – trade services of motion picture video and DVD distribution rights

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – rental services of video tapes and DVDs to the general public, classified in 71.40.12

Label.LabelText: Motion picture projection services
Motion picture projection services
Motion picture projection services in cinemas

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – motion picture projection services in cinemas or in the open air and in private screening rooms or other projection facilities

Label.LabelText: Video or DVD projection services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – video or DVD projection services in cinemas or in the open air and in private screening rooms or other projection facilities

Label.LabelText: Radio and television services
Radio and television services
Radio and television services
Radio services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – production services of radio programmes, whether live or on tape or other recording medium, for subsequent broadcast. These programmes may be for entertainment, promotion, education, training or news dissemination – productions such as sports coverage, presentation of weather forecasting, interviews, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – transmission services of radio programmes, classified in 64.20.22

Label.LabelText: Television services

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – production of television programmes, whether live or on tape or other recording medium, for subsequent broadcast. These programmes may be for entertainment, promotion, education, training or news dissemination – productions such as sports coverage, presentation of weather forecasting, interviews, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – transmission services of television programmes, classified in 64.20.21

Sale of TV/radio advertising time

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – sale of TV and radio advertising time, directly by units engaged in broadcasting

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – Sale of advertising space or time on commission, classified in 74.40.11

Label.LabelText: Other entertainment services
Artistic and literary creation and interpretation services
Works of art
Works of art
Artistic and literary creation and interpretation services
Theatrical producers', singer groups', bands' and orchestras' entertainment services

PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – live theatrical presentation services, including concert, opera and dance production services, whether on a professional or amateur basis and whether set up for only a single event or multiple events

PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – services of personal theatrical or artistic agents, classified in 74.87.17

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – services of personal theatrical or artistic agents, classified in 74.87.17

PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – operation services of concert and theatre halls and other arts facilities – ancillary services to entertainment not elsewhere classified, including the operation of scenery and backdrops, lighting and sound equipment – ticket agencies

Label.LabelText: Fair and amusement park services
Fair and amusement park services
Fair and amusement park services

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory also includes: – operation services of preserved railways and the like

Other entertainment services n.e.c.

News agency services
News agency services

Library and archive services
Library and archive services
Library services

PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – collection, cataloguing, conservation and retrieval services of books and the like – lending services of books, records, DVDs etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – renting services of video tapes and DVDs, classified in 71.40.12 – renting services of books, classified in 71.40.16

Museums' services and preservation services of historical sites and buildings
Museums' services

PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – display services of collections of all kinds (art, science and technology, history) – organization of ad hoc exhibitions – management and conservation services for the collections

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – sale and display services furnished by commercial art galleries, classified in 52.48.37 – services of historical sites and buildings, classified in 92.52.12 – services of botanical and zoological gardens, classified in 92.53.11

Botanical and zoological garden services and nature reserves services

PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – conservation and maintenance services of botanical and zoological gardens

PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – operation services of facilities in which any kind of sports events are performed; such facilities may be arenas or stadia, enclosed or covered, with or without provision for spectator seating or viewing

Other sporting services
Sports event promotion services
Sports event organization services

PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – organisation services of any kind of sports events, outdoor or indoor, for professionals or amateurs – services provided by sports clubs offering the opportunity for sports, i.e. football clubs, bowling clubs, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – services related to sporting events, such as services of individual own-account sportsmen and athletes, judges, timekeepers, instructors, teachers, coaches and the like – services of riding academies and other sports and games schools – services of racing stables, kennels and garages – services rendered by marinas – services of hunting and mountain guides – services related to sport or recreational fishing – services related to sport or recreational hunting – other sporting services not elsewhere classified

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory does not include: – rental services of sporting equipment, classified in 71.40.14

Such services may also be performed on customer premises

PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This subcategory includes: – hair washing, trimming and cutting, setting, dyeing, tinting, waving, straightening and similar services for men and boys as well as shaving and beard trimming

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent

Physical well-being services
